title: Apple hosting six weeks of live virtual ‘App Store Sessions’ for developers, registration now open
content:
Apple has launched a new resource for developers with six weeks of live virtual sessions. Topics include help using in-app events, custom offer codes, product page optimization, customer acquisition, and more. Check out all the details below along with how to register.

more…
